name: sphere-node-sdk
description: Officially supported Node.js SDK library for working with the SPHERE.IO HTTP API, with OAuth2 support.
author: Nicola Molinari <nicola.molinari@commercetools.de>

scripts.coverage: npm run lint && ./scripts/version && NODE_ENV=test babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover test
scripts.dist: npm run clean && ./scripts/version && babel lib --out-dir dist
scripts.test:ci: browserify -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV test ] test | tape-run -b firefox
scripts.test:browser: browserify -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV test ] test | tape-run -b chrome
